website_summaries.verdict: This remarkably inexpensive option offers customers adorable features and grand size for a surprisingly cheaper cost.
pros: 39" bear with stitched paws on legs
Arrives with open, smiling mouth, unlike many stuffed bears
cons: Arrives vacuum packed, forcing owners to re-fluff stuffing
Tends to come with loose or damaged strings

customer_reviews.title: the third picture was the bear like
customer_reviews.text: Because the bear is packed in a vacuum, so when you open the package, you feel it's completely different from the picture. You need to get the cotton out of the bear and lengthen the cotton. In the end, you can get the same bear as the picture. And you didnt need buy other cotton.it is totally enough for this bear. the first picture was my open the package. the third picture was the bear like picture
customer_reviews.author: Liang Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality beat
customer_reviews.text: Comes shrink wrapped, very helpful. Great quality Bear. Needs to be fluffed. If giving as a gift be sure to take out a few days before. This Bear is over 4 feet. Quality stuffing. High quality out fur and eyes. Easy to use zipper on back makes for easy cleaning. Gonna make a great Valentines Day gift. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Halfbackma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bear to use at a show and for advertising for our children's hangers, Monkey Hangup. As you can see by the pictures, it couldn't have been better! We had to use some tape and wires (that can't be seen) to make our bear sit and stand, but everyone who saw it, loved it!
customer_reviews.author: TreeTop Products, LLC

customer_reviews.title: the bear is still limp and sad looking. More stuffing
customer_reviews.text: Needs more stuffing. Bear came vacuum packed for shipping in smallest possible box, and even after following directions (reaching inside to "fluff" and setting outside in the sun), the bear is still limp and sad looking. More stuffing, less vacuum. Worry about the product more and shipping economy less and you'd have a better product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worry about the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying it cause I saw people saying it was really flat and had rips in it but I took my chances. The bear is really soft and I didn’t have to take out the fluff and fix it or anything. It came really nice. Great teddy
customer_reviews.author: Yohanan Hayyim

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Cute bear although it wasn't like the picture. It had no zipper and there were loose threads on the nose and feet. It comes vacuum packed and you have to squish it around to refluff it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very very very bad experience
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 100 inch teddy bear as a surprise and it was really disappointing. the bear size was tall enough but the hands and legs seems broken. contacted the seller and tried ti knead as he said but i do not see any imporvement. even if you try to catch, the head, hands, legs, fall down in their own direction as if they are broken, basically, it does not have enough stuff inside so the distrbution is not good enough and the teddy bear is not the one we want it to be. really really disappointed. i will go and buy costco for $300 instead of this $200 teddy bear which did not meet expectations. Very very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Seller is responsive to problems
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this product lower as the bear split a seam after two days of use; however, upon reading my review the seller reached out to me and offered a refund since I was not satisfied with the product. They stated that the bears were hand sewn and apologized for the seam split as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Great Value....well made and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson Loved it.....vacuum packed so when he open it on a Christmas morning it expanded and what a thril it was watching how happy he was with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Total disaster. The instructions tell you to pull the ...
customer_reviews.text: Total disaster. The instructions tell you to pull the stuffing out of the bear and start over. Absolutely not worth it. And even after I pulled all the stuffing out and tried to puff the stuffing back up, not nearly enough stuffing to make the bear appear as it is in the photo or as any of them are in the stores. The bear comes vacuum packed sealed in a box that is less than 10" x 10" no amount of fluffing the stuff inside the bear is realistic. #ruinedsanta
customer_reviews.author: Yale Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Soft but falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: This bear is huge and soft! My four year old wanted a big cuddly bear to cuddle with. I was excited for him to have this bear but several holes in the seams have came about and the stuffing is able to fall out. It’s a bummer to have spent that much on a bear that is falling apart so quickly. I just sewed up the holes but I found new ones so I think it’s a poor stitching job. Hopefully it’s just an isolated case but I’m not sure I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicolebullshxtt

customer_reviews.title: Great bear
customer_reviews.text: He came in a vacuum packed bag and I wasn't sure he would ever come to life - however, he has a large zipper in the back that you can open, remove the stuffing, fluff it up and he's back to his normal self. Zipper is great for fluffing and cleaning the bear if necessary. Zipper is a hazard to small children because it can be opened and child can eat the stuffing. For a child that is of an age where they won't eat the stuffing, this is a perfect bear.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bear as a toy for my great Dane. If I was to review it from a normal standpoint, I'd say it's a terrific value. The only thing I would change about it is to have them add more stuffing. It isn't full enough To allow the bear to sit up on it's own. Otherwise I would definitely purchase this again, at the price it is.
customer_reviews.author: v-man

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as they say
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this with his own money. My daughter got one from a different place, with the exact measurements as this one showed, and this one is definitely smaller. Not as poofy; nor is it as tall as the one we got for my daughter. We’ve done the hair dryer trick they said to do; and it didn’t do anything. My son still likes it, but definitely not as big as the measurements say it is.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Bear is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these bears for my grandchildren for Christmas and they are falling apart. The seems are opening up all over the bears. My daughter in law says they have hardly even played with them and they are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Holes in several places upon delivery, poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: We quickly received our new bear as a Christmas gift for our daughter. The instructions were easy to follow to fluff him up. He is very cute! Sadly, after my daughter unwrapped him Christmas morning she noticed several holes in him where he had not been stitched together. Even worse,there is about a six inch wide opening under his mouth where his head attaches to his body. Sadly I can't foresee how this bear will survive anyone laying on or carrying him around. We've had him less than one day and stuffing is popping out all his holes. Very disappointing:(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not well built, makes it scary
customer_reviews.text: This teddy bear has its nose and mouth not sewed at the right angle. Of course it's not cute at all, it's even scary. Also, you can see the craftsmanship is not great, the places where it is sewn are very visible. Finally, it smells like chemicals, but I guess this smell might leave with time, I don't know. It is soft, as I didn't take the time to make the filling fluffier like it's advised to do (not worth it with a scary bear), I can't say how fluffy it is, but definitely we can see it's a cheap bear
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Renaux

customer_reviews.title: Bear is dieing a slow death
customer_reviews.text: My daughters bear is splitting at the seams. Not recommended for play. If you want it to be on display it would be great. He is dumping his guts all over. Time to search for a better built bear.
customer_reviews.author: VanDusen family

customer_reviews.title: Quality made bear slightly lacks stuffing but very soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: Overall made well, just wishednit came with more stuffing inside. Although it does allow you to add more through a zipper on the back. My son does enjoy this and it is pretty big much bigger than my 3 year old i would buy this again. I only bought this particular one since the stuffing was already pre "installed".
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Cox

customer_reviews.title: But the fur and very soft / nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I had to fill the neck with a bag's worth of cotton balls so that the head / chin wouldn't rest on its chest; could use a bit more filler throughout. But the fur and very soft / nice.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Came stuffed but you have to take the stuffing out and fluff it up and stuff it back. That's fine and it was really soft and plush and well made. Would recommend to buy again. Had to return this teddy bear as it was not needed and the return was fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Body

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BEAR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. The bear was just awesome!! He loved it and I was very pleased. So pretty!! A pointer: Instead of emptying the stuffing as directions say, I bought large bad of fiber fill and just added it to what was there. Made the bear look so good. Fuller and firmer. Loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Della Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, full and plush
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was hesitant to buy this. It just arrived in the mail, vaccum sealed in a very small box. Upon pulling the bear out of the bag, it was NOT flat and deflated looking as other reviews stated. I didn't even have to "fluff" it up or do anything to it. It is full, plush, and has ZERO tips or tears anywhere on its body. It did infact come with a zipper on the back, and there were absolutely no flaws! My photos will show how it came out of the box immediately after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great bear
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo daughter asked Santa for a really bug bear. Santa came though with this one! It came really compressed for shipping but once shaken out is really nice quality and my daughter loves it. I have not measured it but it is taller than her.
customer_reviews.author: Lphickey26

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy a reputable brand
customer_reviews.text: Picture is straight out of the box. Luckily I didn't have to restuff it,but it needed a bit of adjusting. The material looks cheap, as can be seen in the photo and I dont care for the zipper right up the back. My children will be quick to start pulling out stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: Bears are boys best friends.  This is the size next to his other bear
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson who has a sensory processing disorder. 3 years old. It is not only well made but it is so soft and he loves it. The price was worth it. It's as big as my grandson. And it can be washed and dried in my washer and dryer. No dry cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Penta

customer_reviews.title: Make it a triple
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bears for my granddaughters and my youngest gra,daughter who I thought was too little for it absolutely fell in love with it so I wound up buying a total of three .in my opinion well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mdcd

customer_reviews.title: Best rips at the seems
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a good deal but it’s not. The bear has so many holes in it and we have tried mending it but a new one appears. My son loves it and treats it kindly so not sure why so many holes in the seams.
customer_reviews.author: KRChappell

customer_reviews.title: Needed this in time for friend's birthday but now I feel bad giving her this
customer_reviews.text: Loose thread everywhere and not nearly as plump as the picture advertised as... Needed this in time for friend's birthday but now I feel bad giving her this... :(
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Lovable Huge Bear!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable lovable bear. My son gave it to his girlfriend for Valentine’s day and positioned a couple roses in the bear’s paws. Really cute! Comes compressed in a small box but when you unwrap him, he goes to full size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Bear
customer_reviews.text: The Bear is a gift to a young lady for love and support for some struggles she has faced. She loves it. The next morning she was found sleeping hugging her new friend. Just seeing that was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: das

customer_reviews.title: Big and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this bear to my 10 year old granddaughter for her birthday. She opened it from its vacuum sealed bag and it sprang out as fluffy and wonderful as she had wanted and anticipated! I picked her up from summer camp today and the first thing she said was that she wanted to go home and give her new Teddy a big hug.
customer_reviews.author: Arty smith

customer_reviews.title: It was cute and cuddly until...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute and cuddly until it came apart at the seems and stuffing fell out if its holes. It only lasted two months ☹️ I expected more for the price. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Bear
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girlfriend so this is her review 5 stars. Best cuddler in the universe. Super soft and calms me down. Packaging was odd, but came with directions on how to make the bear look like the picture. Also the directions came with a birthday for the bear and it’s favorite cake flavor which is super cute
customer_reviews.author: I'm not not really real

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed to open a brand new item only to discover ...
customer_reviews.text: It was the size expected, and I didn't mind having to fluff it myself...however there were holes along the seem at the neck. Very disappointed to open a brand new item only to discover I have to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bear that’s big, but will still fit in your child’s bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teddy bear for a great price! I got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it!!! It’s big, but not huge, so it will fit nicely in their bed without being overwhelming. It’s soft and cuddly and super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Less than a week and it put her to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Brought it as an arrival gift for my new born niece. So soft I was sent a picture of her fast asleep on it at less than a week old it's not allowed to stay in her crib for obvious reasons but to see her sleeping that peacefully is proof enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cardell Ray

customer_reviews.title: Must stuff yourself
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like to do it yourself, choose another product. This comes in a vacuum sealed bag. You have to stuff the bear on your own. If you don't mind, then it seems to be a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bear came in a small package with air removed. Bear grows once package is opened. Bear is alot smaller than pictures and looks sickly. I would not buy again not worth the money wasted time and money
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice size, very soft and cuddly and super cute! Husband bought it as surprise and I absolutely love it!!!!!!!!! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: He was sooooo adorable, just follow instructions and you will not be disappointed. The only thing I did was hot glue his mouth shut, for my liking. Everything else was lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum sealed in small box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so I can't give full review. It came is a small box vacuum sealed. I was amazed in the box size. Very clever indeed. Bear is super soft and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alroundj

customer_reviews.title: Seams keep splitting.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, we have had problems with holes from the stitching coming apart and have had to repair it multiple times. It spends most of the time in my son's bed, but it seems like every time you pick it up, another seam splits.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough amazing things about this company. First of all the bear is just as described! Big and fluffy with the softest fur! I noticed one small hole and contacted the company they immediately responded with satisfactory results! Amazed at how great this company is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shalon

customer_reviews.title: Soft but fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I love the bear as a concept; girls love the softness. The downside is that the seams are all super weak and split very easily. I’ve had to re-sew almost ever seam on 2 bears now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rasp-Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas gift to give my girlfriend. The teddy bear was big enough for her and it was extremely soft. She cuddled for it for a long time and she loves having it on her bed
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: What I thought could have been better is if there had been more stuffing in the bear. I did take it out, like the directions said and tried to fluff it, but that didn't work too well. Overall, the granddaughter was thrilled with the bear as she has asked for a bigger bear the last couple of years. I was glad I found one for her.
customer_reviews.author: G’ma Max

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Its nice. Bought it for a Valentine's day gift. Was a little disappointed at first glance but I opened the zipper in the back and fluffed up the stuffing. Came out pretty good. It's worth the price I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: My basset hound loves this bear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this huge teddy bear for my puppy who loves to play with that cuddle with it and sleep with it and it’s very durable even with his sharp puppy teeth I will definitely buy again when needed
customer_reviews.author: KarenP

customer_reviews.title: Filler
customer_reviews.text: Love the bear, got it for my grand kids for Christmas, I took it out of the package but did not take the filler out to fluff it up, it looked ok, just not sure if I would get the filler back in right. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Argyle

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the packaging & once opened the bear was Super Soft & Fluffy. Although my son wanted it to have something to wrestle with. The bear is very durable as well though.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Adorable big teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! I followed instructions and yes it comes little skinny but I took all cotton out and put it back in and now it’s the cutest big fluffy teddy bear! It even stand by it self ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly Talavera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing overall!
customer_reviews.text: The bear did come squeezed in a package, and once unravelled needed to be pressed up so that the cotton could spread around. Besides that, this was an amazing stuffed bear, the size is accurate, its very soft and is almost like a real person. This was a perfect gift for my friend, I suggest if you're looking for a simple but thoughtful gift, buy this bear. Its very subtle but the size makes it all the more better.
customer_reviews.author: jezel de g

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Coming apart at seams.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for 8 year old's Christmas gift. Came apart in 3 places on 1st day. Very poor quality. Didn't come with enough stuffing. Size was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M.

customer_reviews.title: Super-Adorable
customer_reviews.text: OK, the photos make it look bigger than it is. It's 48" long, so 4 ft. Even so, this was a great buy for my son's girl friend for her 16th birthday. I think she really loved the gesture.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Wife

customer_reviews.title: Meh ok
customer_reviews.text: Soft yes, it sheds like a dog no worst, my 5yr unzipped the back and took out the stuffing, should have been a lock or not have the zipper visible
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: Rips at seams easily, but soft and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft but unfortunately he had a huge hole in the seam of his arm the first day we owned it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bear
customer_reviews.text: The bear arrived on time, even before the expected delivery date. However, the zipper is broken and it's starting to unravel there. The reason for my 3 star is because it still served its purpose and my friend was (and still is) very happy with it.. It's very cozy and awesome to cuddle.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Comes in an unusually small box for the said size. The air is vacuum sealed out of the packet. I am preparing this as a gift for my son on Christmas but wanted to leave a quick review. The shipping was super speedy and without unsealing the air this product seems legit. I will leave a more detailed review after Christmas and we fluff the bear up. I am so looking forward to this!
customer_reviews.author: tiare

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed that she opened the box to find pieces of ...
customer_reviews.text: It came unassembled, they need to tell you that it was unstuffed and the stuffing was vaccumed packed with instructions on how to put it together AFTER you wash it. I got it for my six year old grandaughter who had surgery, so disappointed that she opened the box to find pieces of a teddy bear.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Alejado

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap thin material
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material ripped immediately the material so so thin and the beat is not as big as it appears in the pics..very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Denise V

customer_reviews.title: Could use a little bit more stuffing but .....
customer_reviews.text: Could use a little bit more stuffing but very soft and sweet. This was what my five-year-old asked Santa for for Christmas this year and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JennyBloom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected, but plush and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bond

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to give his girlfriend. It comes in a vacuumed packed bag and you need to open and take it out to get fluffy. The instructions say to unzip the back and take the stuffing out and put back in once stuffing is fluffed up. Overall I think she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley  Parham

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESNT COME WITH THE GIRL IN DA PIC
customer_reviews.text: let’s get right to the point... it doesn’t come with the girl in the picture sitting with it. you would think maybe if you set the bear up it will get you hot women... THIS IS JUST A MARKETING PLOY!!! THERE ARE NOT HOT GIRLS ALONG WITH THE BEAR!!!! YOULL BE SAD AND ALONE ON CHRISTMAS LIKE ME!!!! great bear love it, fluffy and a zipper on the back to adjust it and if yours doesn’t come with a hot girl u can just bang the bear f it nahmsayin
customer_reviews.author: tBag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s a giant teddy bear that is super soft, it comes in a smaller box at first so don’t be thrown off by that. 10/10 would recommend, I ordered it for my wife while she’s on the other side of the world and it made it there in about 3 weeks, great job to this seller. Thank you for making this gift possible!
customer_reviews.author: Petrolpete

customer_reviews.title: Huuuuge
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this bear is ENORMOUS! My son is so happy to have this bear that is nearly as big as him and so so soft to cuddle with at night.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old daughter loves this bear! I was worried when it arrived because it was in a fairly small air tight bag. But once you open it the bear is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Oakland

customer_reviews.title: It Was Just As Advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary at first, but I followed the instructions all but the part about the sun, only because it rained in my area and there was no time for sun before the actual event. But none the less, I fluffed it a little here and there and sat it on the couch and it was everything I expected and MORE.....A HUGE SUCCESS for the baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Product not as big as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review. Teddy Bear came compressed. Not as big as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as big as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are given, but wow. My daughter ordered this without checking with me first. She was more than disappointed that the bear is shown to be waaay larger in the picture than it actually is in real life. She was so hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Y

customer_reviews.title: I like my bear bear
customer_reviews.text: Great product I like mine I really cut I like the way it come to the house and you put it together
customer_reviews.author: Belinda New

customer_reviews.title: It's What You Expect
customer_reviews.text: It's a gigantic teddy bear. I bought it for my girlfriend as a gift and she loved it. It's big enough to dress up as well. She decided on a tank top and pajama pants with beer mugs on them. Also very comfy though once all the stuffing gets to expand. Have used this as a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Big bear
customer_reviews.text: Comes vacuum sealed. Fun to watch it expand when opened puffing to full size. Not very heavy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Hey it's good
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and her 2 year old liked it :P unstuff, stretch the cotton and restuff the bear to make it nice and plump. There's more than enough cotton
customer_reviews.author: James Waugh

customer_reviews.title: This bear is adorable! Soft and plush and life size
customer_reviews.text: This bear is adorable! Soft and plush and life size! My son is going to love it on Christmas morning. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rbritt

customer_reviews.title: Bad workmanship!  Bear tears easily at seams.
customer_reviews.text: The near us supper cute but very poorly mad. My son had it only an hour and discovered holes at the seams. I had to sew at least 3 holes in the bear. It was a gift from Santa. He was so disappointed. After I finished fixing it and gave it to him he said “it will just rip again...throw it away”. He was so excited to get the bear that it broke my heart to hear him say that.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Porter

customer_reviews.title: Beary cute!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter requested from Santa! Super cute and cuddly but not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CrystallBlue

customer_reviews.title: Big “A” bear
customer_reviews.text: Big “A” bear the friend I got it for was about the same size. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ‘WowFactor’ Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as the ‘Vermont teddy bear’ but it’s close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for your girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: Its soft and big I got 51 inch basically the size of my girlfriend
customer_reviews.author: Jair

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, soft, big!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, very large soft bear. It came in an air compressed package and I was very concerned before I opened it that it was so small. Lol! It fluffed right up immediately and it is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Overall good toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: it is not that soft as i think.the durability is ok. Overall acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Chen

customer_reviews.title: Size for the price
customer_reviews.text: The size on the picture next to a woman is deceiving. I usually buy around valentines day the giant kind for about 30 bucks, which is still cheaper than this was. My Bernaise dog loves to wrestle with same size toys, this one is half size. I am keeping it, because he still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: PETRA PATTERSON

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft and cuddly bear that’s cute too! So big, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Def big and after removing and fluffing the stuffing he’s a great bear that is pretty good quality. I think for the price, he’s a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Maccarthy

customer_reviews.title: The recipient was in love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: The teddy bear is as cute and big in person as it was in the picture! The recipient was in love at first sight! Delivery was quick and arrived early on the 2nd day!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bear looked nothing like the picture. The bear on the picture looks full and nice. The bear I received looked anorexic. Very disappointing since it was a gift. Definitely would not recommend. I never write reviews but thought I would do one on this product since it was so far off from what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Saenz

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loved it so much, added a recorder to the bear so he could hear my voice & hug the bear in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pittsley

customer_reviews.title: So cuddly
customer_reviews.text: It came flat but after re inserting the insides it came out fine.
customer_reviews.author: joya

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved it! Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved it! Super soft, comfy and nice size. My zipper was a little defective but I eventually got it back on track and fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Young

customer_reviews.title: Great gift if you have time...
customer_reviews.text: Ok ok I like the bear but it did arrive late. I took out just his middle section and left the arms and legs in.fluffed up that stuffing and put back in blew dry the fur on cold and then let sit for a couple hours....
customer_reviews.author: Holly Clements

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! My daughters LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my girls valentine's day gifts, they absolutely love them! Little pricey, but was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah taylor

customer_reviews.title: very soft and cute, doesn’t come w enough stuffing tho
customer_reviews.text: definitely a good product for the price, but it does need more stuffing than it comes with so you have to purchase a bit more of that to fully fill it up. aside from that it is very cute and soft and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: D. McShane

customer_reviews.title: you have to re-stuff the bear
customer_reviews.text: this bear comes vacuum sealed. once you get it out of the packaging you are directed to take the stuffing out of the bear , via a zipper on the back, and fluff it up, then stuff it back in. i attempted to fluff it up in the bear- it didn't work, so i did as directed. a very tedious and time consuming task. if my grandson didn't want it so much i'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: c.w.

customer_reviews.title: Great bear!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my nephew! He loved it. Great size. Super soft! Definitely had enough stuff.
customer_reviews.author: HanSch

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Last picture is the bear on my oldest ...
customer_reviews.text: Bear is not the size pictured! The girl in the photo must be smaller than my 10yr old daughter. Long strings are hanging out from the the mouth area and feet. Very disappointed. Last picture is the bear on my oldest daughters lap. She is 13 and 5’5. They make the bear look larger than it really is sitting in front of the girl and she must be holding a different size bear in the standing photo. Or it’s a good illusion. This is an average size bear. Giant it is NOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I wanted lol but is cute for gifts
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not GIANT
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t giant , sending it back. Shouldn’t be that hard to accurately describe a GIANT bear and actually make it GIANT!
customer_reviews.author: Kang

customer_reviews.title: Not enough filling
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very soft. Just added an entire package of batting to make it full.
customer_reviews.author: alj9201

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bear! It's soft and cuddly It came vacuum packed so you have to take it out and fluff it. I like that because you won't have the strange smells associated with shipping items in just a box. Great price
customer_reviews.author: tammy
